name: proxy-backend
description: Proxy-backend is an HTTP programmable proxying library that supports websockets. It is suitable for implementing components such as reverse proxies and load balancers

scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/**/*.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info
